name: Déjà Blue
description:
The Game 

This is an experimental game that borrows mechanics from both the classic Pong game and Simon Says (follow the leader). The objective of this game is to follow the instructions correctly and play with both paddles, using the space bar to switch control from one to another, effectively playing pong with yourself. 

Things may get wacky after a while. Will you keep following the instructions?

  How to Play 

  • Move the active paddle with WASD or Arrow Keys.
  • Switch active paddles by pressing Spacebar.

The game will give you goals such as "Score with player 1" or "Keep the ball rolling". The actual score of each player is not important, what matters is to follow the instructions correctly.

  Differences between normal and chaos mode 

Chaos mode has 1.75x speed right at the beginning, but each speed increase/decrease is random across the game (with the tendency to become more and more difficult). The songs are randomized and so are all screen effects. It's harder than normal.
